creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
markings:
Inscribed in graphite, recto [en largeur];
Watermark: [Pellet & Legrand] beneath figure of a swan and fleur-de-lis
medium: Pen and black ink, ink wash, black chalk, and watercolor on white wove paper
portfolio: Les Amours d'un poète, bound portfolio
provenance:
Louis Barthou (1862-1934), Paris

(Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago)
title: Study for Illustration to Les Amours d'un poète
